content: ***celebrate the beauty of britain s woodlands with the britain s wild heart blanket cal the cal begins on april 7th 2025 *** this charming c2c design features woodland-themed plants and animals from blooming flowers to playful foxes it s the perfect project for nature lovers and anyone looking to bring a little piece of the wild into their home **how to join ** - free graphs on the elimee designs blog 1 - free video tutorials on youtube 2 - paid ebook includes written and graphical instructions uk and us crochet terms and a large print option you may sell the blankets that you crochet by following this pattern on a small scale provided that you credit elimee designs as the pattern designer mass production is not permitted this pattern or any of its parts may not be altered reproduced distributed sold made into a video tutorial or translated without written permission from elimee designs copies can be made for personal use only please note that all pdf crochet patterns by elimee designs are non-refundable this pattern is only available in english if you would like any support whilst crocheting this pattern or to give us any feedback please contact me here or post in the elimee designs crochet pattern group on facebook 3 sign-up to receive my weekly newsletter 4 where you ll receive freebies hear about giveaways/sales and be the first to know about new pattern launches for all safety notices and gpsr contact details please visit the blog post linked below this pdf if free from viruses malware and a risk assessment has been carried out 1 https //www elimeedesigns co uk/blog/britains-wild-heart-blanket-crochet-along-crochet-pattern 2 https //www youtube com/playlist list=plgejrkl3ziubxmq0tkyat5ik_f5erq4w- 3 https //www facebook com/groups/575696026789853 4 https //dashboard mailerlite com/forms/183962/69245113411307155/share
